Crafted from black iron, this crude suit of +2 resilient full plate is designed to make you look like a horned demon with your face peering out of the screaming maw of the beast.

While wearing the armor, you can attack with the helmet's horns. They're a martial melee weapon with the effects of a +2 weapon potency rune. They deal @Damage[2d8[piercing]] damage and have the deadly d12 and unholy traits. On a critical hit with the horns, the target must succeed at a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:30] or become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Drained]{Drained 1} (or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Drained]{Drained 2} on a critical failure). The horns can't be etched with any runes.

If you're holy, you're @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Drained]{Drained 2} and can't recover from this condition while wearing unholy plate.

Activateâ€”Demonic Slip 2 (concentrate)

Frequency once per day

Effect You cast @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Translocate].

Craft Requirements You're unholy; supply one casting of translocate.
